title: 服务器自动关闭求解

replies.author: l89669
replies.txt_content:
修改/config/forge.cfg里面
removeErroringEntities=true

removeErroringTileEntities=true

这样试试

replies.author: Dominter大大
replies.txt_content: 乱扯 mod问题    删了一个mod就没事了
